U

updateReferences(LinkedList<Record>, LinkedList<Reference>, LinkedList<Reference>) - Method in class dbms.bplus.SecondaryBPlusTree
It updates the references using the reference lists and according to which records were moved.
updateSecondaryIndexes(LinkedList<Record>, LinkedList<Reference>, LinkedList<Reference>) - Method in class dbms.exececution.ExececutionMachine
Updates the secondary indexes whenever there is a change in the data due to a call of deleteFrom(...)
